name: Prestashop Module Paypal + FEE_PS14 - 15
short_description:
Module Paypal Extra Fee
Description

PayPal payment module allows you to transfer the fees charged for the transaction through PayPal in the PayPal payment module configuration, set the percentage to be added to the order.

Merchant Benefits

    the possibility of transferring the commission that collects PayPal customer
    the possibility of establishing any of the percentage to be added to the value of goods
    customer when purchasing is informed of the payment list that if you select payment via paypal will be added him to the calculated value of the contract amount


Features

    does not require modification of the PrestaShop files
    support for multiple languages (name and description of the extra charge are translated in accordance with the language of the customer)
    adding an additional amount is based on the creation of another product which displays immediately after redirecting to PayPal in the payment summary (you can define the name of the product
